Sentencas: A proton-conducting solid oxide fuel cells with a dual-layer electrolyte, constructed of a highly protonic conductive BaCe0.8Y0.2O3-delta (BCY) electrolyte and chemically stable BaZr0.4Ce0.4Y0.2O3-delta (BZCY4) electrolyte, was easily fabricated by dry pressing the electrolyte powders onto an NiO + BZCY4 anode substrate, followed by co-sintering at a high temperature.
Titulo: Fabrication and performance of a carbon dioxide-tolerant proton-conducting solid oxide fuel cells with a dual-layer electrolyte

Sentencas: The performance of the as-fabricated cell with the BCY and BZCY4 dual-layer electrolyte was studied.
Titulo: Fabrication and performance of a carbon dioxide-tolerant proton-conducting solid oxide fuel cells with a dual-layer electrolyte

Sentencas: Peak power densities of 249 and 101 mW cm(-2) were achieved at 700 and 500 degrees C, respectively.
Titulo: Fabrication and performance of a carbon dioxide-tolerant proton-conducting solid oxide fuel cells with a dual-layer electrolyte

Sentencas: Zinc was applied as a sintering promoter to increase the relative density of the BZCY4 electrolyte.
Titulo: Fabrication and performance of a carbon dioxide-tolerant proton-conducting solid oxide fuel cells with a dual-layer electrolyte

Sentencas: Cross-sectional micrographs of the as-fabricated, dual-layer electrolyte cells were obtained by scanning electron microscopy.
Titulo: Fabrication and performance of a carbon dioxide-tolerant proton-conducting solid oxide fuel cells with a dual-layer electrolyte

Sentencas: The results showed that the sintering ability of BZCY4 was improved by using zinc as sintering aid.
Titulo: Fabrication and performance of a carbon dioxide-tolerant proton-conducting solid oxide fuel cells with a dual-layer electrolyte

Sentencas: A cell with BCY and zinc-modified BZCY4 dual-layer electrolyte delivered peak power densities of 276 and 247 mW cm(-2) and OCVs of 1.03 and 1.02 V at 700 degrees C under humidified hydrogen and 15% CO2-containing hydrogen atmospheres, respectively.
Titulo: Fabrication and performance of a carbon dioxide-tolerant proton-conducting solid oxide fuel cells with a dual-layer electrolyte

Sentencas: The operation stability of the dual-layer electrolyte cell under a 15% CO2-containing hydrogen atmosphere was also investigated.
Titulo: Fabrication and performance of a carbon dioxide-tolerant proton-conducting solid oxide fuel cells with a dual-layer electrolyte
